Name: Twinkle
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: It's hard to believe this floral, dry, light golden tipple is so loaded with alcohol. Go easy twinkle toes!
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Tony Conigliaro at The Lonsdale bar in London, England. Originally made using prosecco and elderflower cordial but now mostly made with elderflower liqueur and often champagne.
Nutrition: One serving of Twinkle contains 209 calories
